titleStmt.title: An apology. for the Church of England, with relation to the spirit of persecution; for which she is accused
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: In this edition A1r first column last line has "Imputations" (roman), and the title has a period after "apology".
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
